subject: Basketball
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: With his triple-double of 18 points, 17 rebounds and 20 assists against the Knicks, Rajon Rondo became the first player since Magic Johnson in 1989 to produce at least 17 in each category.
snippet: With his triple-double of 18 points, 17 rebounds and 20 assists against the Knicks, Rajon Rondo became the first player since Magic Johnson in 1989 to produce at least 17 in each category.
